pageContent.descriptionText: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">That’s a good question. To start, we need to capitalize on our resources that we have within the office to effectively manage the flow of existing and new patients. My nursing staff will need to work closely with me to keep me abreast of different formularies for each plan and any formulary changes. Finally, we’ll need to build the trust very quickly with our new patient base.</welcomeText>
